content: the leaves are falling and as we re gearing up for rainstorms and cosy fires the days are slowly getting shorter while it s not quite winter yet the weather is getting chilly and that means that you can t go out without a shawl to keep you warm the maple leaf shawl is 275cm long and 25cm wide the perfect size to wrap around your neck and tuck away in your jacket the pattern is suitable for beginning crocheters and has an accompanying crochet chart for this shawl you need **1 ball of scheepjes ombre whirl** 60% cotton 40% acrylic 225g/1000m i ve used the colour 554 tangerine tambourine
